Class Roots

  • java.lang.Object
    • Roots

  • public class Roots
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods to find the square root and cube root of given values. To find these values, this class uses Newton's Method.
    Version:
    11 Apr 2015
    Author:
    Alexander Hoppe

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double cbrt(double input)
      This method uses Newton's Method to approximate the cube root of a value.
      static double sqrt(double input)
      This method uses Newton's Method to approximate the square root of a value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • sqrt

        public static double sqrt(double input)
        This method uses Newton's Method to approximate the square root of a value. If it does not converge after 100 cycles, it will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of which to find the square root
        Returns:
        The square root of the input value

      • cbrt

        public static double cbrt(double input)
        This method uses Newton's Method to approximate the cube root of a value. If it does not converge after 100 cycles, it will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of which to find the cube root
        Returns:
        The cube root of the input value
